thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Patricia L Vander Kamp
thread.title_full: FlightNetwork.com reviewed by Patricia L Vander Kamp

author: Patricia L Vander Kamp
title: Patricia L Vander Kamp
text:
This is the first time I have ever made reservations to travel.
Your information and prompts were easy to maneuver.
However, I requested a wheelchair as I am unable to walk quickly
or at any distance. How do I make sure there will be one available
for me?
Thank you for this opportunity
Peace
Patricia L Vander Kamp
